It goes to the deep sea. I am not talking about food.

It is alive. There is a type of octopus called the agar octopus, which is said to have seven arms. Normally, octopuses have eight arms.It is alive. There is a type of octopus called the agar octopus, which is said to have seven arms. Normally, octopuses have eight arms.

Morning Musume。 23's Ayumi Ishida and Yume Kudo of Chew Chew Chew are presenting the latest episode of "Halo! STE, presented by Ayumi Ishida of Morning Musume!
Project's 25th Anniversary New Member Audition. Project 25th Anniversary New Member Audition!
How old were you when you auditioned, Yume? Well, I auditioned when I was in the 4th or 5th grade of elementary school.
I had never danced or sung before, but at the audition, I just greeted the auditioners and also I was into a hobby of making rubber bracelets called "fan room".
I carried it in my pocket so that I could answer any questions I was asked.
If you are asked what it is, and if you have something you can take with you, it might be a good idea to carry it in your pocket.
I think he wanted to show it to the audience because he had made something good. Do you have any episodes?
I was 14 years old when I auditioned for the show, and I don't know why, but I was so confident that I would pass the audition, that I really didn't look around me.
Recently, the members were talking about their memories of the audition, like there was this girl and that girl.
I don't remember any of them, and I was thinking only about myself, but I think it's important to have confidence.
But I think it's important to have self-confidence, so even if you don't do anything and you don't have self-confidence, I think it's important to have a good mindset.
Do you have that kind of mindset? I don't know how I feel, but I'm very confident.
I don't know how I feel about it, but I'm very confident and I think it's a good idea for me to be confident that I can pass the test.
I hope that the day will come when you can work with us.
I'm looking forward to it!

Morning Musume。 23's Ayumi Ishida and Juice- Juice's Yumi Kudo are presenting "Halo! STE, presented by Ayumi Ishida of Morning Musume。
It's time to say goodbye. Here is an announcement.
Hello! Project 2023 SUMMER CITY CIRCUIT is now being held.
Morning Musume。 23 will perform at Sendai Sunplaza Hall on August 5, and Juice- Juice will perform at Shinjuku on August 6.
We are looking forward to seeing you there.

And on August 13, Morning Musume ' 23, Angelem and Juice- Juice will perform at the Rockin' Japan Festival 2023. 23, Angulum, Juice Juice, and Airi Suzuki will also perform at the Rockin Japan Festival 2023 on August 13.
Let's have fun while watching out for heat stroke so that we can present a hot stage full of excitement.
Morning Musume。 23 will release Morning Musume。 21 Best Selection THE 25th Anniversary will be released on August 30.
As I mentioned earlier, the contents are really exciting, so I am looking forward to seeing you all picking up a copy.
And Morning Musume。 23 will be going on an autumn concert tour.
This will be the last tour for Sei Fukumura, so we will only be able to present this tour with the 14 of us for one time only.
I am looking forward to seeing many people on this tour with these 14 members.So I too am looking forward to seeing many of these 14 members.
And Morning Musume。 23 has also decided to go on an autumn tour.
We are waiting for Miki Kawashima and the 11 of us, so I hope we can show you the full power of the 11 of us.
Project 25th Anniversary concert will be held on September 9 and 10 at Yoyogi National Gymnasium 1st Daibu-kan.
This will be a special 25th anniversary concert with many of our seniors performing, so I'm looking forward to it. How about you, Miki?
Yes, I'm looking forward to it. It is a dream come true for us to perform together on this stage,
I would like to do my best so that I can show you all how cool I look and make the 25th anniversary a great success. Thank you very much for your support.
Hello! Project members will appear more and more on this channel.
New videos are uploaded every Wednesday, so please subscribe to the channel.
This time, I'll be talking with Ayumi Ishida of Morning Musume。 23's Ayumi Ishida and Juice- Juice's Yumi Kudo.
Good bye.
Please subscribe to our channel.
